channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington has an important job to do in 'Paddington's Earth Day Mission', then in 'Paddington's Special Spring Harvest Celebration', everyone enjoys bringing their own celebration along. (S3, ep 21).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: The Windsor Ruby is missing in 'Paddington's Adventure Club Cracks The Case!', then in 'Paddington And Aunt Lucy's Special Recipe', the Browns set up a takeaway, but it's hard work! (S3, ep 23).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: The Dollhouse Dress Up Chest: Gabby and Pandy go on a dress-up adventure in the dollhouse, wearing different costumes to help the Gabby Cats get out of some sticky situations. (S3, ep 5).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: What Babies Do; Lenses; Igloo; Mr Bull is Getting Married; Getting Ready for a Wedding; Wedding Day; Party Bus; Movie Night: Eight episodes.

channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Save Ms. Marjorie's House: Mysterious holes are appearing all over Ms. Marjorie's yard.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Save a Windy Bay: A really strong wind has suddenly swept up all the surfers in the Adventure Bay Windsurfing Race.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington has an important job to do in 'Paddington's Earth Day Mission', then in 'Paddington's Special Spring Harvest Celebration', everyone enjoys bringing their own celebration along. (S3, ep 21).

channel.desc: Who is Paddington's Special visitor that Jonathan and Judy have helped come from afar? // It's the last night of Hanukkah and Mr Gruber's Hanukkiah breaks before he can light the final candle.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: The Pups must find the missing flounder in 'Pups Save a Disappearing Flounder', then in 'Pups Save Little Grandpa and Mr. Alex', the pups help track down the missing Mini Patrol. (S10, ep 18).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Everest cares for a white wolf cub in 'Pups Save a White Wolf', then in 'Pups Save a Wrong Way Explorer', wrong-way explorer Travelling Travis, takes Chickaletta to the North Pole! (S6, ep 19).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Rubble & Crew
channel.desc: The pups help a baby deer get home in 'The Crew Raises A Runway', then in 'The Crew Builds A Giant Skateboard', Auntie Crane and River go on a wild ride. (S2, ep 18).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora and Boots have to get a picture of a rare bird for Abuela in 'Catch The Quickatoo', then in 'Lost Lorito', Dora and Boots return a baby parrot home, who can't stop copying Boots. (S1, ep 1).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: A fire breaks out in 'Pups Save A Baby Goat Birthday', then in 'Pups Save A S'more-Mergency', Humdinger goes camping, and has just one thing on his mind. (S11, ep 23).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Francois' pants catch on fire in 'Pups Save the Flaming Flounder', then in 'Pups Make the News', a news crew is in town when Chickaletta accidentally causes a fire in new parkette. (S11, ep 22).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Rubble & Crew
channel.desc: The Crew And Skye Build A Mountain Lodge: Skye visits the Crew when they need some aerial support. When Speed Meister tries to beat the pups to finish the job, it's time for rescue mode! (S2, ep 10).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
channel.desc: The Pirate Grand Prix: It's Pegwheel the pirate's first race - so who better to join him than Pirate Blaze? Can they beat Crusher to the trophy and prove they're the best on the seven seas? (S8, ep 1).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: A fire breaks out in 'Pups Save A Baby Goat Birthday', then in 'Pups Save A S'more-Mergency', Humdinger goes camping, and has just one thing on his mind. (S11, ep 23).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Francois' pants catch on fire in 'Pups Save the Flaming Flounder', then in 'Pups Make the News', a news crew is in town when Chickaletta accidentally causes a fire in new parkette. (S11, ep 22).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Rubble & Crew
channel.desc: The Crew And Rocky Build A Bear Island: Rocky visits Rubble & Crew from Adventure Bay just in time to see Builder Cove's new baby bear! Park Ranger Rose asks for some construction help, (S2, ep 24).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
channel.desc: The Garbage Truck Challenge: Blaze is competing in the ultimate trash-themed race, but Crusher is racing too, and he'll do anything to crush the competition. Who will come out on top? (S8, ep 4).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Bunty II: Mr Elf has built a new boat to replace the one Big Bad Barry ate. He is nervous when the king commands him to take them on a cruise to a tropical paradise - will Big Bad Barry strike again.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Gaston is Lost: Ben and Holly want to play with Gaston the ladybird but he is missing. Nanny Plum uses her magic crystal ball to find him, and discover his daily routine is not what they thought.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Chickens Ride West: King Thistle wants a boiled egg for his breakfast, so the elves decide to deliver the King the chickens from the Elf Farm so he can have an egg whenever he likes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Mermaid: Lucy and her dad are having a relaxing day boating on the lake. They fish out an old glittery mirror from the bottom of the lake, but it belongs to a mermaid who would like it back.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Arrby recruits a crew to gather magical seeds in 'Pups Save the Meerkat Pirates', and in 'Pups Save a Hum-Hippo', Mayor Humdinger wants a hippo as his new hench-animal, but it gallops off! (S10, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Humdinger steals Farmer Al's super-powered seeds in 'Pups Plus a Plucky Chicken', then in 'Pups Save a Pet Show', there's a pet show where owners and their pets dress in matching outfits. (S11, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Abra-CAT-dabra: A tiny top hat delivery leads to a dazzling day for new magician Baby Box. Meanwhile, her closest friends help her perform a boppin'-and-hoppin' trick. (S2, ep 5).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Daddy Pig has a very overdue library book, which is always a good excuse to visit 'The Library', and then in 'The Camper Van', Peppa and her family go on holiday in a special van.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Camping Holiday; Grandpa's Compost Heap: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Thomas & Friends
channel.desc: Travels with Terence: Terence breaks his tyre tread, Thomas takes him to get fixed and explore some of the island. But Terence's off-track energy isn't quite fit for more orderly places. (S27, ep 14).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Richard Rabbit Comes To Play: Richard Rabbit comes to play with George, while Suzy Sheep comes to play with Peppa. The little boys don't want to play the same games as Peppa and Suzy.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Fun Run: Daddy Pig struggled to run a race to raise money to fix the school roof, but finds it far easier when a wasp is chasing him.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: When Smurfette rescues Brainy from a snake, the others ask her to teach them \"Smurf-Fu', then in 'Diaper Daddy', everyone is tired of changing Baby's diapers, Handy invents a robot to help.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: A silver ant is swept up by a sandstorm in 'The Search for the Silver Ant Hill', then in 'The Search for the Swamp Snapper', Sam and Kit visit the swamp to investigate a dinosaur sighting. (S1, ep 10).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora needs to find rainbow water on 'The Alebrije Adventure', then in 'Let's Get A Paleta', on a super-hot day, everyone wants paleta, but Val's paleta truck is stuck! (S1, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Myrna the Mynah bird leads her new friends astray in 'Pups Save a Big Bad Bird Crew', then in 'Pups Save a Soapbox Derby', a newcomer named \"Hum-Kid\" shows up to a kids-only sopabox derby. (S7, ep 10).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Claw finds a way to make Sparks' breath icy in 'Pups Break the Ice', then in 'Pups Save Excalibark', when Chase accidentally becomes the Royal Knight, the Duke and Claw aim to ruin things. (S8, ep 20).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Rubble & Crew
channel.desc: The pups help a baby deer get home in 'The Crew Raises A Runway', then in 'The Crew Builds A Giant Skateboard', Auntie Crane and River go on a wild ride. (S2, ep 18).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines
channel.desc: Truck Rangers: Blaze and his friends have joined a scouting club where trucks earn badges for their accomplishments. Crusher's selfish scouting lands everyone in a heap of trouble! (S1, ep 15).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Cupcake Tree: When the Gabby Cats get stuck in the leaves of an overgrown cupcake tree, it's up to Gabby, Pandy and cupcake-expert Cakey to work together to save CatRat. (S2, ep 12).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Daisy and Poppy's Trip to the Museum: The naughty toddlers cause chaos again. Mrs Fotheringill gets zapped back to the stone-age, and Nanny Plum turns everyone into frogs.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Gaston's Birthday: It's King Thistle's birthday, but he does not want a birthday party. But Gaston the ladybird has never had a birthday party, so King Thistle says it can be Gaston's birthday party.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: Sam and Kit look for a mysterious bird in 'The Puzzle of the Plummeting Eggs', then 'The Missing Mole Rat Princess', the duo tracks down a royal mole rat who left her underground palace. (S1, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora shows the twins a baila folklorico dancer who comes to life in 'Tiny Dancer', then in 'The Sleepy Sun', the sun won't set because it can't fall asleep! Dora needs to find Pillow Cloud. (S1, ep 8).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Everest cares for a white wolf cub in 'Pups Save a White Wolf', then in 'Pups Save a Wrong Way Explorer', wrong-way explorer Travelling Travis, takes Chickaletta to the North Pole! (S6, ep 19).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Washing: Daddy Pig hangs his clean football shirt out to dry, but Peppa, George and Mummy splash it with mud. They put it in the wash, but Peppa puts her red dress in, which makes Daddy's shirt pink.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Polly's Boat Trip: Peppa and George go on a boat trip with Grandpa Pig, but they must send for help when their boat runs aground. Polly Parrot fetches Granny Pig and Granddad Dog, who rescues them.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Delphine Donkey; The Fire Engine: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Jonathan and Judy can't agree on what to do in 'Paddington and the Big Decision', then in 'Paddington's Beach Stowaway', the Browns come back from a beach with more than sand in their hair! (S2, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington has a new friend in 'Paddington and the Caterpillar', then in 'The Floor is Lava', The Browns take part in a competitive game, but will they make a good impression on a visitor? (S2, ep 8).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Daisy and Poppy's Pet: The Twins really want a pet and Nanny Plum sets about getting them one. She magics them up Pippin the hamster. The Wise Old Elf even brings Pippin a hamster wheel.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Lucy's Picnic: On a tour of the Elf Factory, the Elf and Fairy children learn about recycling and see how rubbish is re-used. When the factory runs out of material, they set out to find some more.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Acorn Day: It's autumn and the Elves and Nanny Plum are busy clearing up all the leaves. Suddenly the squirrels arrive with a mission to store acorns in the Great Elf Tree. Acorn Day has arrived.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Elf Submarine: Ben and Holly set out to rescue Redbeard the Elf Pirate's sunken treasure. Mr Elf steers the Elf Submarine to the bottom of the lake, but then they are gobbled up by Big Bad Barry.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: School Project: It's school project time for Peppa and her friends which means they have to build castles and bring them into playgroup.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Police: Police Officer Panda and Police Officer Squirrel have come to teach Peppa and her friends all about bicycle safety.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mummy Pig's Book: Mummy Pig has finally finished writing her first book and decides to take it to playgroup to read to the children with unexpected results.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Zoo: Madame Gazelle takes the children on a trip to the Zoo where they get a tour from the zookeepers; Mr Lion, Mrs Crocodile and Mr Giraffe.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Owl; The Apple Tree; The Big Hill; Hippies; Bug Hotel; Parachute Games; Flying Discs; Kiddie Workout: Eight episodes.

channel.desc: Paddington must keep his promise to not make a mess in 'Paddington's Goo Monster', then in 'Paddington's Apple Pip Adventure', Paddington and Simi go on a journey into the human body. (S3, ep 1).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Mr Curry is sure there's a monster in the park lake in 'Paddington and the Lake Monster', and in 'Paddington's Space Radio', Toq wants to let her dad know she's thinking of him up in space. (S3, ep 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington helps Mateo dress up in 'Paddington and the Three Musketeers', then in 'Paddington and the Dinosaur Hunt', Paddington, Simi and Jonathan are on a dinosaur hunt in the park. (S3, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Kico the Kittycorn: Every time a rainbow appears, a Kittycorn family gets their special baby Kittycorn! So when Gabby unboxes a baby Kittycorn, all the Gabby Cats help her take care of it. (S3, ep 6).

channel.title: Peppa Pig

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Save the Fizzy Pickles: Mr. Porter is delivering his famous fizzy pickles to people around town when a bumpy road shakes up the deliveries and causes the pickle jars to pop.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: A storm sends a polar bear cub to Adventure Bay in 'Pups Save a Windswept Polar Bear Cub', and in 'Pups Save a Drive-In', the pups must save Mayor Humdinger from a runaway movie projector. (S10, ep 4).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Two robots take on more than they can handle in 'Pups Save Their Digi Tal Friends', then in 'Pups Save the Rainbow', Mayor Humdinger finds a prism that drains Adventure Bay of colour. (S10, ep5).

channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Save the Big BBQ: Adventure Bay is getting a Fire Station! When disaster strikes during the opening day barbecue, it's up to the Paw Patrol to put it out. (S11, ep 18).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Royal Picnic: Holly invites Ben on the annual Royal Fairy Picnic. King Thistle hopes there won't be a repeat of last year's magical jelly flood.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Gaston The Ladybird: Holly and Ben think Gaston the Ladybird is sad so they try and cheer him up by tidying his cave. But Gaston liked his cave just as it was - all messy and untidy.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Holly's Magic Wand: Holly needs her wand to do magic. But one day Holly loses her wand and is very sad. Ben uses his elf skills to find it again.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Elf Farm: Holly goes with Ben and Mr Elf to the elf farm to collect an egg for the King's breakfast. While there, a huge chicken escapes from the farm and Holly and the elves have to chase it.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Farmer Yumi's bees go missing from her farm in 'Pups Save the Honey', and in 'Pups Save Mayor Goodway's Purse', Mayor Goodway's purse disappears along with its precious cargo - Chickaletta! (S6, ep 4).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: It's a hot day in Adventure Bay, and things are melting in 'Pups Stop a Meltdown', then in 'Pups and the Mystery of the Missing Mobiles', mobile phones are vanishing all over town! (S6, ep 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Fairy Festival: 5.4.3.2.1. It's fairy o'clock - and the start of a fantastic festival, featuring rides, games, cotton candy and a new friend with a flower contest dream. (S2, ep 6).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Grandpa At The Playground; Goldie The Fish: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Funfair; Numbers: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Thomas & Friends
channel.desc: Crab Crossing: While repairing a sea wall, Sandy and Carly accidentally cut off a consortium of crabs from shore! When the crabs wreak havoc the duo must redirect them to the water. (S27, ep 15).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Digging Up The Road: Peppa and her family are trying to get to the playground, but Mr Bull and his team are digging up the road.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Freddy Fox: Peppa and her friends are playing hide and seek, but it's Freddy Fox with his super smelling nose who is the best at playing that game.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Handy has invented a machine that allows him to understand animals in 'What the bear said', then in 'Parallel Worlds', Clumsy and Dimwitty open up a portal with other worlds. (S3, ep 12).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: The Mystery on the Monsoon Express: Animal detectives Sam and Kit collect all the clues while searching for the slithering suspect who bit an express train's engineer. (S1, ep 1).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora and Boots get a baby back to its mama in 'The Little Axolotl', and in 'Bubble Trouble', Dora must save the Big Red Chicken who floats away in a bubble right before the big talent show. (S1, ep 6).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Harold creates a ray that freezes everything in 'Mighty Pups vs. The Big Chill', then in 'Mighty Pups vs. The Mighty Cheetah', Chase must stop Cheetah and restore his crystal. (S10, ep 16).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: The Paw Patrol helps a Mystery Knight in 'Pups Save a Tournament', then in 'Pups Save the Baby Dragons', the Rescue Knights must save some baby dragons from Claw. (S8, ep 19).

channel.desc: The pups squirrel-proof a post office in 'The Crew Builds A Post Office', then in 'The Crew Builds A Super Farm Animal Wash', Rubble & Crew transforms the car wash. (S2, ep 20).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK

channel.desc: Trouble at the Truck Wash: When Crusher overloads Gabby's Truck Wash with too much soap, Blaze and AJ must embark on a sudsy, soapy quest to track down the missing pieces and rebuild it. (S1, ep 16).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: DJ's Glow Ride: Gabby receives a glow-in-the-dark train, but its cars are missing. With help from DJ Catnip, the Gabby Cats build the remaining cars. (S1, ep 21).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Daisy and Poppy: Holly and her friends must stay in the courtyard and play with Holly's little twin sisters Daisy and Poppy. All is fine until the twins borrow a magic wand and escape from the castle.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Queen Thistle's Teapot: Queen Thistle has a beautiful new teapot so delicate that no one is allowed to touch it. Holly accidentally breaks the teapot and tries to fix it with Ben's help.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: Friendly rhinos gather at the Watering Hole in 'The Riddle of Raging Rhinos', and in 'The Trouble in the Tundra', Sam and Kit are on the case when the Mice Squad goes missing in the Arctic. (S1, ep 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora gets baby crocs to sleep in 'Croc-A-Bye Baby', The Troll appears in 'Wanna Empanada?', Boots tries new boots in 'if The Boot Fits', and the twins have problems with a 'Pinata Party'. (S1, ep 10).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: The Pups must find the missing flounder in 'Pups Save a Disappearing Flounder', then in 'Pups Save Little Grandpa and Mr. Alex', the pups help track down the missing Mini Patrol. (S10, ep 18).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Whistling: Peppa hears Daddy Pig making a strange sound. It's called whistling, but when Peppa tries, she discovers that it is quite impossible - at first.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Doctor Hamster's Tortoise: Doctor Hamster visits the school and brings some animals with her. Binky the tortoise is very popular - but ends up needing to be rescued by Miss Rabbit.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: It's a lovely day at the beach - or it would be, if it wasn't snowing, in 'Sun, Sea and Snow', and in 'Grandpa Pig's Computer', computers are useful for important work - as well as Happy Mrs Chicken.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington becomes the world's first Bearonaut in 'Paddington's Space Adventure', then in 'Paddington's Blackberry Treasure', Jonathan, Judy & Paddington pick blackberries in the garden. (S2, ep 9).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: A gate is left open when 'Paddington Opens the City Farm', then in 'Paddington the Upcycler', Baaz teaches Jonathan and Paddington about upcycling, but can the pair create something? (S2, ep 10).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Visiting The Marigolds: Everyone is visiting snooty King and Queen Marigold's Castle. King and Queen Marigold give them a tour, which is not without a few mishaps.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Party: It's the twins' birthday party and chaos ensues when their little friends arrive. The Wise Old Elf tries to entertain them, but they turn him into a mouse.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Snow: It's Christmas Eve and the presents have been delivered to Father Christmas by Mr Elf in the Elf plane. But there are toys missing, so Ben and Holly head off on a special trip! (Part 1 of 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: North Pole: On route to deliver the final box of presents, the Elf Plane is forced to land. But no one minds, because it's an opportunity for everyone to meet Father Christmas! (Part 2 of 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Outback: The Pig family visit the Kangaroo family in Australia! On their first day they fly into the outback in Mr Kangaroo's aeroplane, have a barbeque and play some cricket with a Koala.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Surfing: On their second day in Australia the Kangaroo family take the Pig family to the beach where they try out surfing. George shows off his skills when he's out paddling with Daddy Pig.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Great Barrier Reef: Today the family go to work with Mrs Kangaroo on the Great Barrier Reef. While taking in the beautiful views in Mrs Kangaroo's submarine, they find some special treasure.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Boomerang: The holiday is coming to an end but there's still time to play with a Boomerang and make friends with Mr Wallaby. They all have trouble keeping the boomerang under control, though.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Playgroup Garden; Bowling; Swimming Lesson; Rock Pools; Recycling; The Boat Pond; The Traffic Jam; Bedtime: Eight episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Swimming Lesson; Rock Pools; Recycling; The Boat Pond; The Traffic Jam; Bedtime: Six episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington builds a robot in 'Paddington Meets PaddingTron', then in 'Paddington's First Diwali', Baaz invites everyone to celebrate Diwali with him and Paddington is his helpful assistant. (S3, ep 5).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington has a race against time in 'Paddington and the Solar Eclipse', then in 'Paddington and the Mysterious Inventor', Simi receives an inventor's award, but why does she feel sad? (S3, ep 6).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: The Browns go to the beach in 'Paddington's Summer Holiday Begins', then in 'Paddington's Life Guard Training', Paddington, Jonathan and Judy rescue Mr Brown with lifeguard Taylor's help. (S3, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Something is making strange noises in 'Paddington's Mysterious Cave Discovery', and in 'Paddington and the Fossil Hunt', Judy wants to find a fossil on the beach, but isn't having any luck. (S3, ep 8).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Chloe's Birthday Party; Broken Party Bus; Spooky Clubhouse; Living Above the Shops; Roof Top Garden; Moving In; Everybody Sleepover!; Walking Bus: Eight episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Save the Butterflies: Chickaletta is stuck on a runaway drone and mysterious butterflies are causing chaos all around Adventure Bay.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Save an Underground Chicken: The statue of Chickaletta has been stolen by Mayor Humdinger and is making its way through Adventure Bay's underground tunnel system.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington must keep his promise to not make a mess in 'Paddington's Goo Monster', then in 'Paddington's Apple Pip Adventure', Paddington and Simi go on a journey into the human body. (S3, ep 1).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Mr Curry is sure there's a monster in the park lake in 'Paddington and the Lake Monster', and in 'Paddington's Space Radio', Toq wants to let her dad know she's thinking of him up in space. (S3, ep 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Pedro Pony has a broken leg, and is visited by the whole class when he is in 'Hospital', and then it's time for a chocolate egg hunt in 'Spring', which all the children enjoy.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Everyone gets a ride, even Daddy Pig (who does his best to avoid it) in 'Miss Rabbit's Helicopter', and then in 'Baby Alexander', we find out that babies cry a lot - but they like to listen too.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines
channel.desc: Cattle Drive: When Blaze and Starla encounter a herd of cows wandering out in the desert, they must embark on a wild west adventure to bring them back to Starla's barn. (S1, ep 17).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Let's Make a Movie!: When Gabby unboxes two little containers of popcorn and two movie tickets, it's movie night in the dollhouse! (S1, ep 14).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Grandpa Pig takes Peppa, George and Danny Dog to visit 'Grampy Rabbit's Lighthouse', and then in 'Miss Rabbit's Day Off', the whole town pitches in to do Miss Rabbit's jobs when she hurts her ankle.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Suzy and Peppa go on secret missions and do secret things in 'The Secret Club', and then in 'Grampy Rabbit's Boatyard', Grandpa Pig needs help when his boat sinks, so Granddad Dog gives them a lift.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: A talking Mini Patrol go on a wild adventure in 'Pups Save a Talkative Mini Patrol', then in 'Pups Save the History of Adventure Bay', Humdinger steals an ancient book. (S10, ep 22).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Chickaletta takes flight on a toy plane in 'Pups Save a High-Flying Hen', then in 'Pups Save a Sloth', Mayor Humdinger mistakes a sloth for a monkey, and races the Paw Patrol to find it. (S10, ep 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Sharkdog
channel.desc: Surf's Up, Sharkdog!: When Sharkdog and Dennis get stuck together, Max must find a way to separate them before the big surf contest. (S2, ep 17).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Sharkdog
channel.desc: A Star Fish Is Born: When Sharkdog steals the show in the new aquarium commercial, Max must overcome a serious case of jealousy. (S2, ep 18).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Rubble & Crew
channel.desc: The pups squirrel-proof a post office in 'The Crew Builds A Post Office', then in 'The Crew Builds A Super Farm Animal Wash', Rubble & Crew transforms the car wash. (S2, ep 20).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: There's a game of hide-and-seek in the wetlands in 'The Lost Capybara Kids', then in 'The Case of the Curious Keas', Sam and Kit try to figure out who's playing tricks on them in the snow. (S1, ep 17).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Dreamer tries to become a knight in 'Knight Smurfalot', then in 'Forget Me What?', when Gargamel accidentally breathes in the pollen of a rare flower it instantly wipes his memory. (S1, ep 18).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora helps the twins see the rainbow in 'Rainbow's Lost Colours', then in 'Boots' Rubber Band Ball', Boots has to retrieve his ball after it lands in Cynthia the Centipede's yard. (S1, ep 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Mr. Curry's favourite radio show is cancelled in 'Paddington's Radio Show', then in 'Paddington's Butler', Mr. Curry is Paddington's butler for the day - but he prefers giving orders! (S2, ep 22).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The class have a music lesson, which is very noisy, in 'Shake, Rattle and Bang', and in 'Champion Daddy Pig', Daddy Pig loses his title as Champion Puddle Jumper, and trains to win it back.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mr Fox's Van; Chloe's Big Friends: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Madame Gazelle takes the children to Grampy Rabbit's 'Gym Class', where they learn how to be real explorers! Then in 'The Blackberry Bush', Peppa and her family visit Granny and Grandpa Pig's garden.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mrs Zebra teaches Peppa, George, Zoe, Zaza & Zuzu Zebra how to make things from clay in 'Pottery', and then in 'Paper Aeroplanes', some of Daddy Pig's important work papers have gone missing.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Frog Prince: Holly accidentally turns Ben into a frog. With the help of her friends, Holly tries to turn Ben back into an elf but instead turns him into a bird and then a rabbit.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The King's Busy Day: Holly spends the day with King Thistle on his royal duties. King Thistle must launch an elf boat, judge a fairy fruit competition and make a speech at the festival.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Fun and Games: Ben and Holly are having fun playing in the meadow. Holly gets frustrated when Ben uses his elf skills to win all the games. Ben gets frustrated when Holly uses her magic skills.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: King Thistle Is Not Well: King Thistle has a cold and needs medicine. Nanny Plum, Holly and Ben have fun collecting the ingredients for a magic potion to make him better.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: It's the Windsor Gardens pet show in 'Paddington becomes a Talent Show Judge', and in 'Paddington Keeps Up With The Kamalis', playing with neighbours is more fun than trying to outdo them! (S2, ep 23).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: Someone's snatching all the fruit in 'The Mysterious Fruit Thief', then in 'The Riddle of the Wrestling Lizards', the agents try to bring some peace to a pair of brawling gila monsters. (S1, ep 5).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Sharkdog
channel.desc: Surf's Up, Sharkdog!: When Sharkdog and Dennis get stuck together, Max must find a way to separate them before the big surf contest. (S2, ep 17).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Sharkdog
channel.desc: A Star Fish Is Born: When Sharkdog steals the show in the new aquarium commercial, Max must overcome a serious case of jealousy. (S2, ep 18).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Kitty School: When Gabby unboxes a school notebook and lunch box, it's Kitty School Day in the dollhouse! Gabby and Pandy learn and live a day in the life of a student. (S1, ep 4).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Gargamel turns himself into a snail in 'Shell Game', then in 'Blossom Goes Wild!', Blossom gets into a fight with Storm and Lily, leaves the village, and moves into the forest with Wild. (S2, ep 8).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Storm misplaces her warrior spirit in 'Storm Loses her Mojo', then in 'Pop Out', Gargamel casts a spell which makes everything that Grouchy complains about appear inside his hovel. (S1, ep 17).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Travelling Travis is on another great adventure in 'Pups Save an Antarctic Martian', then in 'Pups Save the Maze Explorers', Mr. Porter and Alex get trapped inside a huge maze! (S7, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: The Pups must save Rocky and Humdinger in 'Pups Save a Box Fort', then in 'Pups Save Travelin' Travis From Really Big Bill!', Skye helps Traveling Travis search for Big Bill Island. (S8, ep 17).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora needs to find rainbow water on 'The Alebrije Adventure', then in 'Let's Get A Paleta', on a super-hot day, everyone wants paleta, but Val's paleta truck is stuck! (S1, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Dollhouse Store Day: When Gabby unboxes a coin purse with kitty coins, it's Store Day in the dollhouse! Gabby and Pandy help out at all the different stores to earn kitty coins. (S1, ep 12).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Edmond Elephant's Birthday; The Biggest Muddy Puddle In The World: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and her family visit a theme park in 'Potato City', where the magic of vegetables never ends. Then in 'The New House', Daddy Pig takes Peppa and George to see a house that Mr Bull is building.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Lost Egg: Ben, Holly and Gaston the Ladybird find a large egg in the meadow. A tiny chick hatches from the egg and the children must find the mummy bird.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Elf Games: Ben is in training for the elf games, Holly wants to join in but the rules state there is absolutely no flying or magic allowed. Ben gives Holly a chance to join in without using magic.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Nanny Plum's Lesson: Nanny Plum is teaching the fairy girls some important fairy rules when she is blown away, trapped in a tree, dropped in a stream and covered in mud.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Elf Factory: The Elf Factory is deep down in the roots of The Great Elf Tree. It is almost Christmas time and the elves are busy making toys. Some magic saves the day when there is a problem.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Tiny Chef Show
channel.desc: Chef struggles to perform magic tricks in 'Noodle Bowls', and then in 'Spicy Cauliflower Bites', Chef makes an extreme snack. (S3, ep 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Big Hairy's little brother falls into a hole in 'Pups Save Little Hairy', then in 'Pups Save a Kooky Climber', Daring Danny tries extreme rock climbing with Ace Sorenson. (S7, ep 18).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Basketball: The children are taught how to play basketball by Daddy coach. They are soon good enough to take on a bigger team.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Horsey Twinkle Toes: Mr Zebra delivers a parcel for Peppa and George from their Auntie Dottie. What could it be.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Doctor Hamster's pet, Tiddles, has got stuck up a tree, again in 'Naughty Tortoise', and then it's off to 'Mr Fox's Shop' to find a nice present for Granny and Grandpa's Anniversary.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Lucky the dog's luck might have run out in 'Paddington's Lucky Day', then in 'Paddington the Pizza Chef', Baaz's niece Simi is visiting and he wants to create the perfect pizza for her. (S2, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Judy loses a tooth in 'Paddington & The Tooth Fairy', then in 'Paddington Goes to Work', Paddington becomes a work bear and helps Mr. Brown at home, but learns computers can be tricky. (S2, ep 12).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Royal Picnic: Holly invites Ben on the annual Royal Fairy Picnic. King Thistle hopes there won't be a repeat of last year's magical jelly flood.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Gaston The Ladybird: Holly and Ben think Gaston the Ladybird is sad so they try and cheer him up by tidying his cave. But Gaston liked his cave just as it was - all messy and untidy.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Holly's Magic Wand: Holly needs her wand to do magic. But one day Holly loses her wand and is very sad. Ben uses his elf skills to find it again.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Elf Farm: Holly goes with Ben and Mr Elf to the elf farm to collect an egg for the King's breakfast. While there, a huge chicken escapes from the farm and Holly and the elves have to chase it.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Nursery Rhymes: Madame Gazelle and the playgroup are sharing their best nursery rhymes with each other.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Digger World: Mummy and Daddy Pig, Peppa and George have a wonderful day with Mr. Potato at Digger World.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Doll Hospital: When Peppa gets Teddy dirty jumping in muddy puddles, she goes to The Doll Hospital.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Wendy Wolf's Birthday: Wendy Wolf's birthday is here and she has invited Peppa and friends around for a party.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: London; Simple Science; When I Grow Up; The Ambulance; Doctors; Super Potato; Creepy Crawly Safari; Hoops: Eight episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: When I Grow Up; The Ambulance; Doctors; Super Potato; Creepy Crawly Safari; Hoops: Six episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington learns that seagulls love chips in 'Paddington vs the Seagulls', and in 'Paddington and the Light House', the lighthouse light is broken - can Paddington help save a boat at sea? (S3, ep 9).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington seeks Captain Green Beard's loot in 'Paddington's Pirate Treasure Hunt', then in 'Paddington's Sandcastle Showstopper', everyone is keen to win the sandcastle competition! (S3, ep 10).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Some pufflings get lost in 'Paddington's Puffling Rescue', then in 'Paddington Goes Under The Sea', Paddington enjoys a diving adventure with Jonathan and Judy - but where is her necklace? (S3, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: The beach is a mess until 'Paddington's Beach Clean Up', then in 'Paddington's Holiday Farewell', the summer holidays have come to an end, so it's time to say goodbye to their new friends. (S3, ep 12).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Happily Ever After; Singing Lesson; Singing Competition; Grandpa's Robot; Paper Games; Clouds; Mr. Bull Digs Up The River; Granny Sheep Moves In: Eight episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Save a Duck Pond: When water in the duck pond mysteriously drains out, it's up to the Paw Patrol to find out what's happening.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Save the Kitty Rescue Crew: Mayor Humdinger makes fake emergencies for his kitties to save so they appear better than the Paw Patrol.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington helps Mateo dress up in 'Paddington and the Three Musketeers', then in 'Paddington and the Dinosaur Hunt', Paddington, Simi and Jonathan are on a dinosaur hunt in the park. (S3, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Things go missing in Windsor Gardens in 'Paddington's Journey into a Black Hole', then in 'Paddington's Rainbow Race!', Simi and Paddington try to find the gold at the end of rainbow. (S3, ep 4).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Shadows; International Day: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Rain does not stop play, it just moves it inside in 'The Rainy Day Game', and then in 'Mummy Rabbit's Bump', Mummy Rabbit comes to visit with a big tummy, and everyone is in for a surprise.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines
channel.desc: Knight Riders: While racing, Blaze and Crusher discover a medieval kingdom holding a Royal Race! The two trucks become knights to compete with other knights in the race across the realm. (S2, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: The Meow-Mazing Games: When Gabby, Pandy, and Carlita prepare for the annual Meow-Mazing Games, they encounter stiff competition from the Doodads. (S1, ep 17).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Pedro Pony spends the day just like in the Wild West in 'Pedro The Cowboy', and then in 'Peppa and George's Garden', Grandpa Pig brings some seeds for Peppa and George to grow a garden.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: It's a busy day for Doctor Hamster, with lots of animals needing her help in 'The Flying Vet', and then in 'Kylie Kangaroo', Peppa and George meet Kylie Kangaroo and her brother Joey.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Emmy and Eddie take a joyride in 'Pups Save the Wacky Water Skiers', then in 'Pups Save the Mayor's Assistant', Daring Danny X becomes Mayor Humdinger's assistant, and builds a theme park! (S10, ep 1).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Wally the Walrus searches for Cap'n Turbot in 'Pups Save a Lonesome Walrus', then in 'Pups Save the Hummy Gummies', Mayor Humdinger is jealous of Helga Humdinger's Hummy Gummy treats. (S8, ep 24).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Sharkdog
channel.desc: Sharknapped!: When Sharkdog doesn't come home from the aquarium, the Sharkpack go on a mission to find their missing friend! (S2, ep 19).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Sharkdog
channel.desc: Sharkdog Makes a Splash: The Sharkpack must stop Mr. Ceviche before he spills Sharkdog's secret. (S2, ep 20).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Rubble & Crew
channel.desc: The pups build the first hotel in town in 'The Crew Builds A Hotel', and then in 'The Crew Builds A Hiking Trail', the crew saves a duck birthday party. (S2, ep 22).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: Sam and Kit track a legendary creature in 'The Legend of the Night Howler', then in 'The Haystack Stakeout', who would steal a cute forest pika's dry flower pile? (S1, ep 18).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Jokey transforms Poet into Gargamel's Mom in 'Funny Mommy', then in 'Smurfy Day Care', Storm has to become a super smurfsitter when all of the Smurfs turn back into babies. (S1, ep 14).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora and Boots get a baby back to its mama in 'The Little Axolotl', and in 'Bubble Trouble', Dora must save the Big Red Chicken who floats away in a bubble right before the big talent show. (S1, ep 6).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Lucky comes to stay over in 'Paddington's Pet Hotel', and then in 'Paddington Plays Golf', Baaz has set up a mini golf course at the park, but is it really unbeatable like he says? (S2, ep 24).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Captain Daddy Dog; Grampy Rabbit's Dinosaur Park: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Daddy Pig reads Peppa and George a story to help them fall asleep in 'Bedtime Story', and then in 'Lost Keys', Peppa and her family have been to a mountain beauty spot, when Daddy Pig loses the keys.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mr Dinosaur is replaced with a newer model in 'George's New Dinosaur', while in 'Grandpa Pig's Train To The Rescue', Miss Rabbit's train has broken down, full of passengers who need to get to work.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Everyone at playgroup has brought in their pets for 'The Pet Competition', and then in 'Spider Web', Mummy Pig finds a spider in the house and orders Daddy Pig to please move it into the garden.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Mrs Witch: Queen Thistle reads Ben and Holly a book about a nasty witch, so Nanny takes the children to meet a real one who lives in the forest. Nanny is rude to the witch, who freezes her with magic.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: King Thistle's New Clothes: Snooty King and Queen Marigold are coming to visit, but when the King's new clothes get dirty Nanny cleans them, along with the King's old clothes - and shrinks them all.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Elf School: Holly and Nanny Plum join Ben at Elf School, where the Wise Old Elf tells them that strictly no magic should be used. Holly finds it difficult until Nanny uses a little magic to help.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Royal Golf Course: A mole disturbs King Thistle's Golf Course, so a gnome is enlisted to help drive it away. Soon though the gnome is turning the King's golf course into a crazy golf course.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Mr. Brown is talking about selling the house in 'Paddington Loves Windsor Gardens', then in 'Paddington Helps a Hedgehog', the kids are playing in the garden and make a prickly discovery. (S2, ep 26).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: Bill and Jill's satellite van has a hole in it in 'The Case of the Big Chomp', and in 'The Secret of the Salt Cave', Sam and Kit investigate the shrieks keeping the bats awake in a cave. (S1, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Sharkdog
channel.desc: Sharknapped!: When Sharkdog doesn't come home from the aquarium, the Sharkpack go on a mission to find their missing friend! (S2, ep 19).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Sharkdog
channel.desc: Sharkdog Makes a Splash: The Sharkpack must stop Mr. Ceviche before he spills Sharkdog's secret. (S2, ep 20).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Pandy's Birthday: It's Pandy's birthday!! The dollhouse is throwing a surprise party for him! (S1, ep 18).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Papa Smurf wants to prove that alchemy is more powerful than magic in 'Smurfy Magic Duel', then in 'Doctor Brainy & Mister Dumb', Brainy's new invention backfires and leaves him brainless. (S2, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Leaf gets sick, causing some wild climate changes in 'Leaf's Under the Weather', then in 'House Call', Gargamel gets sick, and the Smurfs feel obliged to help him. (S2, ep 25).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Squirrels stash acorns in Alex's treehouse in 'Pups Save the Squirrels', then in 'Pups Save a Roo', when a joey is separated from its mother, it's up to the pups to save a roo and the day! (S6, ep 20).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Farmer Al's harvest machine goes haywire in 'Pups Stop a Super Shaker', then in 'Pups Save a Flying Farmhouse', Farmer Al has a wild dream that his animals start acting like humans. (S8, ep 16).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora shows the twins a baila folklorico dancer who comes to life in 'Tiny Dancer', then in 'The Sleepy Sun', the sun won't set because it can't fall asleep! Dora needs to find Pillow Cloud. (S1, ep 8).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Kitty Rangers: Kitty Ranger Team Leader Mama Box helps Kitty Ranger Gabby and Pandy get a lost Baby Me-Owl back home to its Mama in the Fairy Tale Garden, and embark on a hiking adventure! (S1, ep 16).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Noisy Night; Wishing Well: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Madame Gazelle is leaving (don't worry, not really) in 'Madame Gazelle's Leaving Party', and then in 'The Queen', Miss Rabbit is to be given the Queen's award for industry, for all the work she does.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Morning Noon And Night: The Wise Old Elf teaches the elf children how to tell the time using a watch, while Nanny Plum would much rather use a dandelion clock to teach the fairy children.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Gaston's Visit: Gaston catches a cold when his cave has a leaky roof, so Holly invites him to stay at the Little Castle until it is fixed. But soon Gaston is taking over.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Trip To The Seaside: Holly joins Ben and his family on a trip to the seaside, and Mr Elf tells her that no magic is to be used. But when no one has remembered to pack lunch, they ask Holly to help.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Ben's Birthday Card: Holly forgets Ben's birthday, and rushes home to make him a birthday card. But Nanny has stopped all magic, so Holly has to make the card herself.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Tiny Chef Show
channel.desc: Chef turns a garden cactus into nopales in 'Nopales Tacos', then in 'Sloppy Joes', Chef tries to keep his new apron clean. (S3, ep 1).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: A mixed-up delivery leads to chaos in 'Pups Save a Rocket Roller Skater', then in 'Pups Save Ryder's Surprise', Ryder's present ends up in the jungle and Carlos is trapped. (S7, ep 14).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Desert Island: When a fishing trip goes wrong, leaving Grandpa Pig and Grampy Rabbit stranded on a desert island, Captain Daddy Dog is the only one able to save them. He realises he misses the sea.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Perfume: After smelling Granny Pig's perfume de lavender, Peppa experiments with the flowers in the garden to create her own special smell.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The school roof has a leak again, so the children raise money for a new roof in 'Children's Fete', then in 'The Aquarium', Goldie the Goldfish is feeling lonely, so Peppa takes her to the aquarium.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: The Browns have unbelievable new neighbours in 'Paddington's New Neighbour', and in 'Paddington Makes the News', Paddington, Jonathan & Judy create a newspaper but need a front page story! (S2, ep 13).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Mr. Gruber does a good turn for Paddington in 'Paddington Shares A Good Deed', then in 'Paddington Goes Green', Paddington learns about composting, and tries to grow flowers for Aunt Lucy? (S2, ep 14).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Daisy and Poppy: Holly and her friends must stay in the courtyard and play with Holly's little twin sisters Daisy and Poppy. All is fine until the twins borrow a magic wand and escape from the castle.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Queen Thistle's Teapot: Queen Thistle has a beautiful new teapot so delicate that no one is allowed to touch it. Holly accidentally breaks the teapot and tries to fix it with Ben's help.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Frog Prince: Holly accidentally turns Ben into a frog. With the help of her friends, Holly tries to turn Ben back into an elf but instead turns him into a bird and then a rabbit.
